mangaName: Osake wa Fuufu ni Natte Kara
alternativeNames: El alcohol es solo para parejas
お酒は夫婦になってから
author: Crystal Na Yousuke
description: The "slightly sweet tipsy couple comedy" manga centers on the 28-year-old senior public relations company staff member Chisato Mizusawa. The story follows Chisato's daily life as she enjoys her husband Sora's cocktails. Chisato has secrets that only her husband knows.
